title: [Inhouse] Enhancement Features_II
description:
Description
  As a PO of the O3 Team
I would like to support several enhancements on the Inhouse E2E Chain to have more orders transmitted, enriched and best case completed in/from EOS
So that EOS users can deliver faster & at higher quality to our end customers.
Features i.e.:
E2E Testing Support for MAGBUS-84653 - Inhouse Basic: Terminierung Teil 2/2 Topfbuchung I Head/Pool Order & Appointment
Exception/Error handling & E2E Testing Support for MAGBUS-84681 - Inhouse Basic: Auftragsabschluss (Faktura) für Pionier Betrieb I EOS O3 SECE-IT Invoice (Frakturieren)
Testing Support wrt Order Structure amendment & E2E Testing Support for MAGBUS-100840 - Inhouse Basic: Erweiterung der Änderungsaufträge um den Umzug und SLA Nachvermarktung I SECEIT Umzug , SLA Nachvermarktung
SeCeIT Partial Order cancellation (includes trigger of total order cancellation in case total order consists of only 1 partial order)
